---
name: Feature Request
about: Suggest an idea for ORC
title: '[FEATURE] '
labels: enhancement
assignees: ''
---

## Feature Description
A clear and concise description of what you want to happen.

## Problem Statement
What problem does this feature solve? Why do you need it?

## Proposed Solution
Describe how you envision this feature working.

## Alternative Solutions
Describe any alternative solutions or features you've considered.

## Use Cases
Describe specific scenarios where this feature would be useful.

## Examples
If applicable, provide examples from other tools or mockups.

## Priority
How important is this feature to you?
- [ ] Critical - Blocking my workflow
- [ ] High - Would significantly improve my experience
- [ ] Medium - Nice to have
- [ ] Low - Minor enhancement

## Additional Context
Add any other context, screenshots, or links about the feature request here.

## Willing to Contribute?
- [ ] Yes, I'd like to work on this
- [ ] Maybe, with guidance
- [ ] No, just suggesting
